description: Harmony is our most comfortable sofa ever, thanks to its deep seat, plush cushions and go-anywhere lumbar and throw pillows. Made for sprawling out or curling up, its low, clean-lined frame has reinforced joinery and comes in your choice of depth: standard or extra deep.
features: ** Choose your sofa depth: Standard (41") or Extra Deep (47").
*   Engineered hardwood frame with slot + tenon joinery.
*   Solid wood legs in a Dark Walnut finish (removable).
*   All wood is kiln-dried to prevent warping.
*   High-gauge sinuous springs provide cushion support.
*   Seat cushions have fiber-wrapped, high-resiliency polyurethane foam cores.
*   Back cushions are 50% polyester fiber, 45% duck feather and 5% duck down in down-proof ticking.
*   Reversible cushions (Astor Velvet excluded) with zip-off covers.
* Make sure it fits! See our guide on measuring for delivery .
